description: Try our easy to follow Orange Yoghurt Tart recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Orange Yoghurt Tart Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To serve, gently remove tart from tin, garnish with candied oranges and slice.
